title: list-style-position
description: The `list-style-position` CSS property sets whether the list item markers should appear inside or outside the content flow.
content: The property that defines the position of the list marker (like a bullet or number) relative to the list item's content. It can be set to 'inside' (marker is part of the list itemâ€™s content flow) or 'outside' (marker is outside the content flow), affecting the layout of the list.
